plan: For the next rounds, I'll explore a mix of aggressive and conservative strategies. Initially, I'll bid slightly above my value to test competitors' aggressiveness. If I observe high bids, I'll switch to underbidding slightly below my value to potentially win at a lower cost. Occasionally, I'll bid aggressively close to $99 to gather data on their maximum bids. I'll also monitor any patterns in Betty's and Charles' bids to adjust my strategy dynamically. This approach balances risk and potential profit, leveraging insights from previous rounds to optimize long-term gains.

In the initial rounds, I'll bid just below my value to secure a profit if I win. I'll then test aggressive strategies by occasionally bidding above my value to gather data on opponents' bids. Midway, I'll adjust by analyzing opponents' average bids to undercut them strategically. In later rounds, I'll refine my strategy by leveraging patterns observed, focusing on maximizing profit margins. I'll also test random bid variations to disrupt predictable patterns and gather further insights. The goal is to balance risk and reward, adapting dynamically to maximize long-term profit.

I will start by bidding slightly above my value to gauge opponents' strategies. If my value is high (above $70), I'll bid aggressively close to $99 to secure wins. For mid-range values ($40-$70), I'll experiment with bids just above the average to balance winning chances and costs. For low values (below $40), I'll bid conservatively to minimize losses. I'll track opponents' bidding patterns to adjust my strategy, especially noting if they frequently bid at specific thresholds. This approach will help maximize long-term profits by balancing risk and reward while gathering data on opponents' behaviors.

Alternate between bidding slightly above and below my value. Occasionally bid aggressively near $99. Monitor Betty's and Charles' patterns to adjust dynamically. Prioritize bids closer to my value when others bid low. Aim for data-driven decisions to optimize long-term profit.
